structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Probate Of Wills And Appointment Of Executors

law.catch_line: Death Of Executor; Completion Of Duties
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 12. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] The executor of the will of an executor shall not, as such, administer on the estate of the first testator.
